name: Bacon and Cheese Fat Bombs
author: Kisha McDaniel Logsdon
summary: Following a keto diet means bacon and cream cheese are your best friends, and these fat bombs deliver the goods with spicy serrano peppers and zesty lime.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
3  serrano peppers, seeded and finely chopped
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Lay bacon strips in a single layer on the sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until browned and crisp, about 15 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels
Mix cream cheese, butter, and Cheddar cheese together in a bowl
Add lime zest, a squeeze of lime juice, and garlic
Fold serrano pepper into mixture; refrigerate until chilled and stiff, about 10 minutes
Divide chilled cream cheese mixture into 6 equal parts and roll into balls to make the fat bombs
Chop bacon and place in a bowl with cilantro
Roll 1 fat bomb at a time in the bowl to coat
